column4: so in fact one can't have the best of both worlds, by best i mean stability of warty desktop and sweet features of say, new firefox? i thought ubuntu backports are something kind of a compromise...
we have six monthly releases. some people are just waaaay too impatient, or too scared to test.
I see, this best of all possible worlds sometimes happen to be a cruel place :)
can additional repos containing, say, Sun's Java, also get in the way when upgrading to hoary?
